organization.description: The organization to which the team belongs.

id.description: The unique identifier of the team.

node_id.description: The node identifier of the team.

url.description: The API URL of the team.

html_url.description: The URL of the team on GitHub.

slug.description: The unique URL-friendly name of the team.

privacy.description: The privacy setting of the team.

notification_setting.description: The notification setting of the team.

permission.description: The permission level of the team.

members_url.description: The URL to fetch members of the team.

repositories_url.description: The URL to fetch repositories of the team.

parent.description: The parent team of the team.
